hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: confirm
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: In order to run this job you need to set this to "YES". Just a small protection to not run it accidentally.
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: BUG: copies -doc subpackages. needs fixing first before running (dmueller)!

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: targetproject
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Select the target project (the one in IBS). The job will figure out from where and what packages to fetch.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash # DEBUG MODE with E=echo # NORMAL MODE with E= E=echo #==========================
if ! [ "YES" == "$confirm" ] ; then echo "Error: This job run was not confirmed - maybe accidentally, thus aborting" exit 1 fi
case $targetproject in Devel:Cloud:2.0:Staging) source="openSUSE.org:Cloud:OpenStack:Grizzly" ;; Devel:Cloud:3:Staging) source="openSUSE.org:Cloud:OpenStack:Havana" ;; Devel:Cloud:4:Staging) source="openSUSE.org:Cloud:OpenStack:Icehouse" ;; esac
IBSAPI="https://api.suse.de"
# lists tlist=IBS_${targetproject//:/_}.ls slist=OBS_${source//:/_}.ls
#filter out _* and *-doc packages osc -A $IBSAPI ls $targetproject | grep -v "_.*" | grep -v "\-doc$" > $tlist osc -A $IBSAPI ls $source | grep -v "_.*" > $slist
t=$(mktemp)
while read pack ; do echo -n "== $pack: " if grep -qx "$pack" $slist ; then rm -f $t osc -A $IBSAPI rdiff -u "$targetproject" "$pack" "$source" > $t if fgrep -q ".changes" $t ; then echo "copying" cat $t $E osc -A $IBSAPI copypac -K "$source" "$pack" "$targetproject" -m "auto-copypac by jenkins job openstack-fetch-OBS" else echo "No .changes entry" fi else echo "skipping" fi done < $tlist
rm -f $t
